about_the_game:
This is the Garrison: Archangel Original Soundtrack, featuring the songs in the game composed by Richard "RE:CHARRED" Nicolas. Enjoy the beats and rhythms of fast-paced, customizable, mecha combat!


The OST includes 18 special non-looped versions of tracks used in-game plus a special bonus!
detailed_description:
This is the Garrison: Archangel Original Soundtrack, featuring the songs in the game composed by Richard "RE:CHARRED" Nicolas. Enjoy the beats and rhythms of fast-paced, customizable, mecha combat!


The OST includes 18 special non-looped versions of tracks used in-game plus a special bonus!

name: Garrison: Archangel Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 114 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1,019 MB available space

short_description: This is the Garrison: Archangel Original Soundtrack, featuring all of the songs in the game composed by Richard "RE:CHARRED" Nicolas.
